name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course introduces a general framework for English language course design to be applied in varying contexts and circumstances. Students are required to develop a course of their own through which they will learn to become aware of decision making at each stage of the course design and to elaborate and justify their design. They are also expected to integrate critical theories in education into their course design by examining the viewpoints of various classroom teachers and researchers.
